Posts.Content: Dec 13, 2011 07:33PM clarrissa wrote: The plan is to do chemo once every 3 weeks. I will be switched to some hormone treatment but don't know when. I was prescribed Percocet today for the back pain. I start chemo Friday- provided that the MUGA scan today shows that my heart is strong enough. I was called about a consultation for radiation to the lower back but it was for the same time as my preop for the port was scheduled. That's where I am now- preop Thurs., chemo Fri., meeting with surg. Mon., port installed next Wed.
